text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium kloeckeri is an anamorph species of the genus of Penicillium.
text.Further reading:
John I. Pitt; Ailsa D. Hocking (2009). Fungi and Food Spoilage. Springer Science & Business Media. ISBN 0387922075.
Ajit Varma; Ajit Varma; Gopi K. Podila (2005). Biotechnological Applications of Microbes. I. K. International Pvt Ltd. ISBN 8188237310.
Unknown ICMSF (2012). Microbial Ecology of Foods V1: Factors Affecting Life and Death of Microorganisms. Elsevier. ISBN 0323154875.
John F. Peberdy (1987). Penicillium and Acremonium. Springer Science & Business Media. ISBN 0306423456.
